description:
Ever wonder what Project Management involves? This course will provide you with key concepts and techniques for successfully managing projects from planning to completion. After taking this course you will be able to:
(1) Differentiate between projects and operations
(2) Identify the different phases of a project
(3) Develop strategies to effectively handle projects
(4) Assess if Project Management is a career path for you
(5) Collaborate and share your Project Management experiences with others!
title: Project Management Basics
